description: Lists details for a network operation, including when the operation started and the status of the operation. A network operation is any operation that is done to your network, such as network instance instantiation or termination.

nested_items.name: networkOperations
nested_items.description: Lists network operation occurrences. Lifecycle management operations are deploy, update, or delete operations.

nested_items.name: detail
nested_items.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: A human-readable title of the problem type.

nested_items.name: lcmOperationType
nested_items.description: Type of lifecycle management network operation.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date that the resource was created.

nested_items.name: lastModified
nested_items.description: The date that the resource was last modified.

nested_items.name: nsdInfoId
nested_items.description: The network service descriptor id used for the operation.

nested_items.name: vnfInstanceId
nested_items.description: The network function id used for the operation.

nested_items.name: nsInstanceId
nested_items.description: ID of the network instance related to this operation.

nested_items.name: operationState
nested_items.description: The state of the network operation.

nested_items.name: updateType
nested_items.description: Type of the update. Only present if the network operation lcmOperationType is UPDATE.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
